nodes.text: Is @JoeNBC trying to normalize the domestic white terrorist? “He’s just a 17 year old kid. He must be crazy”. Joe wants the kid to get off.  \nOf course Joe is. It’s white on white crime.  But Joe won’t talk about his prior arrests for weed or illegal firearms #KenoshaShooting

@CougarTrainee @InactionNever @JoeNBC Beware of the Republican Plot Against Protesters: William Barr says communities will not have "police protections" without respect for officers: https://t.co/MuTmAxkPgd

@CougarTrainee @JoeNBC Joe and Mika were loyal Trumpists until he offended them. They've figured what tirades to go on that will move the needle (ratings), but every now and then they circle the wagon and show their true colors.
